content.raw:
Thank you for providing this Docker script here: https://bitbucket.org/scpeters/unix-stuff/src/24adf335b2f0c514f1fdfc3b5d951aeb14a3bc96/gazebo8-docker/Dockerfile?at=master&fileviewer=file-view-default

I am trying to use it (my first Docker experience), and I'm running into the following issue when running the big `apt-get install` command:


Some packages could not be installed. This may mean that you have
requested an impossible situation or if you are using the unstable
distribution that some required packages have not yet been created
or been moved out of Incoming.
The following information may help to resolve the situation:

The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 libignition-transport2-dev : Depends: libignition-msgs-dev but it is not going to be installed
E: Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages.


I manually installed `libignition-msgs-dev`, and re-ran the command, now getting:

The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 libgazebo7-dev : Depends: libsdformat4-dev but it is not going to be installed
                  Depends: libignition-math2-dev but it is not going to be installed
 libignition-transport2-dev : Depends: libignition-msgs-dev but it is not going to be installed
E: Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages.
content.html:
Thank you for providing this Docker script here: https://bitbucket.org/scpeters/unix-stuff/src/24adf335b2f0c514f1fdfc3b5d951aeb14a3bc96/gazebo8-docker/Dockerfile?at=master&fileviewer=file-view-default

I am trying to use it (my first Docker experience), and I'm running into the following issue when running the big apt-get install command:

Some packages could not be installed. This may mean that you have requested an impossible situation or if you are using the unstable distribution that some required packages have not yet been created or been moved out of Incoming. The following information may help to resolve the situation:

The following packages have unmet dependencies: libignition-transport2-dev : Depends: libignition-msgs-dev but it is not going to be installed E: Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages.

I manually installed libignition-msgs-dev, and re-ran the command, now getting:

The following packages have unmet dependencies: libgazebo7-dev : Depends: libsdformat4-dev but it is not going to be installed Depends: libignition-math2-dev but it is not going to be installed libignition-transport2-dev : Depends: libignition-msgs-dev but it is not going to be installed E: Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages.
